name: Music Trail
description:
This is a short Prototype that suppose to present a musical EP that i wrote.

This is a learning project that i took to try and test some new stuff that i learnt in unity and Fmod.

There are 4 planets and 3 kind of items scattered around the very small some kind of a map.

Each planet will activate a different song and each item will activate different effect.

Space - Accelerate     Ctrl - Stop    WASD - Movement
